Report on the "Paintings Museum"
In order to write this report, I spent hours in this wonderful museum. There, I saw the exibitionsexhibitions and admired the building itself. I walked around the garden too.
Location
The museum is located in Ouchy, in front ofopposite the "Delamuraz Hotel". It is close to the main road, and at 300 metersmetres offrom the station.
Outside

The building is made of white stones. It has two floors. Before going inside, you have to paspass through the huge garden. There, ponds, pools, trees, flowers and ducks can be admired. I recommend you to take your swim suitswimsuit, because in summer, it is allowed to swim in the pools.
Inside

When you are inside the museum, you will be impressed by the paintings on the walls. ThereThey were all paintingpainted during the war by nurses. If you go down a few steps, you will discover the ceilarcellar. Everything in this room is aboutconnected with wine.
To learn the whole history of the building, there is a room dedicated to it on the first floor.
I particularly recommend you to visit the "blue" room. Everything in this room is blue, the carpet, the ceiling and even the door.
According to the owner, it was a room where in the past people used to go when they were depressed.
Conclusion
To sum up, I would like to add that this house is the most famous in our city. You should come and visit it for the paintings or for the building itself.
You won't be disappointed.
The only negative point is that you have to pay 10 francs to visit. the house and the garden.
